message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $7,000?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but $7,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and offer it to you for $8,500.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference again and settle on $7,750?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I can do $8,200, which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
Okay, Alice, one last offer from me.  If you'll do $8,000, I'll take it off your hands today. That's as high as I can go.
